short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some useful functionality to the stw forum such as user ignoring and easy-quoting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a chrome extension designed to add a bit of missing functionality to the singletrackworld forums. Implemented so far are:

+ Block User posts
+ Block user threads
+ 1 click quoting
+ 1 click blocking
+ Hide the share button
+ Option to show hidden post
+ Links to return to go to chat forum, bike forum etc... above reply box
+ Post signature
